definition: male/Baron, lowest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/CL:個|个[ge4]
erhua variant of 男孩[nan2 hai2]

sentences.english: The big boys jumped into the river but little Ned hung back.
sentences.chinese: 大些的男孩子都跳进河里了，但小内德畏缩不前。

sentences.english: What the little boys didn't know was that a second train was heading straight for them.
sentences.chinese: 另一列火车正朝他们驶过来，两个小男孩却浑然不知。

sentences.english: He is a physically active, super—curious and highly inquisitive boy.
sentences.chinese: 他是一位体力活跃，非常好奇以及很好问的男孩。

sentences.english: Bll the boys laughed to hear the good news.
sentences.chinese: 听见这个好动静然后，所有的男孩都笑了。

sentences.english: Melva kisses another guy in front of her boyfriend justifying it to herself as an eye for an eye.
sentences.chinese: 梅尔瓦在男友面前亲吻另一个男孩，自以为报复。

sentences.english: A young boy descends into a saphire mine in southern Madagascar.
sentences.chinese: 一个小男孩下到马达加斯加南部的一个蓝宝石矿里。

sentences.english: During the Jin dynasty, a boy, called Mao Bao, was born into an impoverished family.
sentences.chinese: 晋朝时，有一位名叫毛宝的小男孩，家境十分贫困。

sentences.english: Boy stole a lesson-book from one of his school-fellows and took it home to his Mother.
sentences.chinese: 有个男孩偷了同学的一本教科书，带回家给母亲。

sentences.english: The two boys vied with each other for the first place.
sentences.chinese: 那两个男孩子争第一名。

sentences.english: The boys are seen with some style changes and dramatic smoky eye make up.
sentences.chinese: 男孩们看起来造型有了些变化，而且还化了烟熏妆。

sentences.english: Please tell the boy not barge about the room.
sentences.chinese: 请叫那男孩别在房间里乱碰乱撞。

sentences.english: The little boy fell headlong down the flight of stairs.
sentences.chinese: 那小男孩头朝下跌下楼梯。

sentences.english: Perhaps, this is the unbending youth from northeast of China.
sentences.chinese: 也许这就是一个北方大男孩的那种倔强吧？

sentences.english: For a boy of fourteen his own home is the only Paradise.
sentences.chinese: 对于一个十四岁的男孩来说，自己的家就像是个天堂。

sentences.english: The little boy can count up to a thousand.
sentences.chinese: 呢个小男孩能足数到一千。

sentences.english: The mother laid the sleeping boy against her.
sentences.chinese: 母亲让睡着的男孩紧靠着她。

definition: erhua variant of 男孩[nan2 hai2]
erhua variant of 女孩[nu:3 hai2]
